bibl.title: A Syriac letter reused for a Greek tax receipt from the Early Islamic Period
bibl.note: P. Mich. Inv. 7198. Provenance unknown, late VII - early VIII CE. - Introduction. - 1. Front: Fragment of a Syriac Letter. - 2. Back: Greek Tax Receipt
bibl.seg: A.E.T. McLaughlin & Lajos Berkes, A Syriac Letter Reused for a Greek Tax Receipt from the Early Islamic Period.
